name: metrix-sitemap
description: A professional, modern website for Metrix Realty Group, a premier real estate appraisal and consulting firm serving Southwestern Ontario. This website embodies a "McKinsey-like" authoritative brand while being optimized for lead generation, local search visibility, and trust building.

scripts.use-tailwind: cp index-tailwind.html index.html && echo 'Switched to Tailwind CSS version'
scripts.use-custom: cp index-custom.html index.html && echo 'Switched to custom CSS version'
scripts.use-enhanced: cp index-enhanced.html index.html && echo 'Switched to enhanced YesWeDoWeb-inspired version'
scripts.backup-current: cp index.html index-backup.html && echo 'Current version backed up'
